name: Kirby's Dream Land Plus
description:
Kirby's Dream Land Plus is a Kirby Fangame as a GameBoy platform and was made by BluePopo & Team Gamble

Controls

L R arrows to move and change settings

U or Z + Z to float

X to inhale

D to change debug mods

Scroll down for other debut things

Join Team Gamble's discord server https://discord.gg/qgxUPqv

Tags: Kirby, Kirby's Dream Land 2, Kirby's Dream Land
